List your property

How It Works

Everything a broker does — done better, faster, and for 4%.

1

List Your Property

Send us your unit details — we photograph, verify, and syndicate your listing across top rental sites.

2

We Handle Tours

Renters self-book showings 24/7. We host tours or provide secure smart lock access for self-guided viewings.

3

We Screen Tenants

Automated background, income, and credit checks — only qualified applicants make it to your inbox.

4

You Approve & Sign

Review, approve, and e-sign leases digitally — your property filled, faster and for just 4%.

The Find dashboard automates listings, tours, and leasing — all from one clean interface.

Traditional Broker Find
Commission 12–15% 4% flat
Scheduling & Showings Manual Automated / Smart Locks
Tenant Screening Manual Integrated
Application & Lease Paperwork & Email All digital
Transparency Low Real-time dashboard

FAQ

Common questions from NYC landlords.

Do I pay anything upfront?

No — you only pay when a lease is signed. No hidden costs or setup fees.

How are tenants screened?

Every applicant is verified through credit, income, employment, and background checks before being presented to you.

What happens if a tenant breaks the lease early?

We’ll re-list your unit at no additional cost within the first three months. Our goal is to keep your property occupied.

Which neighborhoods do you cover?

We currently support all of Manhattan, Brooklyn, and Queens — with more markets coming soon.

Find

Full-service NYC leasing for a flat 4% fee. We list, show, and lease your units — faster and smarter.
